name: Recipe: Wakatakeni
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Wakatakeni.

value.name: Bamboo Shoot
value.desc: A fresh young bamboo shoot, straight out of the ground. It is a delicious cooking ingredient with an exotic aroma, found exclusively in bamboo-growing regions.

value.name: Seagrass
value.desc: A plant that grows in shallow seas. It adds a unique flavor to dishes.

value.name: Wakatakeni
value.desc: A light-colored vegetarian dish. Broth is first poured into the pot before the bamboo shoots, and then the seaweed, are added in. The result is an elegant product with a light mouthfeel that agrees well with all palates. Suitable as a pre-meal appetizer or as a side to a main dish.

value.text: <color=#ffffffd9>Purchase from Kiminami Anna at Kiminami Restaurant</color>
